description.value: Once per Combat Encounter, after killing a target with a Ranged Attack (Ally or Enemy), character can spend a Fate Point and make a +0 Command Test. If successful, each of their allies within 10 metres gain +5xDoS to their next Ballistic Skill or Weapon Skill Test made before the end of the encounter, meanwhile each enemy within 10 metres suffers a -5xDoS penalty to their next Ballistic Skill or Weapon Skil Test made before the end of the encounter.
